pli-tv-bu-vb-pc81:2.1.8: The six are linen, cotton, silk, wool, sunn hemp, and hemp; see [pli-tv-kd8:3.1.6](). According to [pli-tv-kd8:21.1.4]() the size referred to here is no smaller than 8 by 4 _sugataṅgula_, “standard fingerbreadths”. For an explanation of the idea of _vikappanā_, see Appendix of Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc81:2.1.18: These are all formally appointed officers of the Sangha. | According to Sp 4.893.16 (commenting on the _sekhiya_ rules) _khajjaka_ refers to all fresh foods: _ettha mūlakhādanīyādi sabbaṁ gahetabbaṁ_ , “Here the fresh foods which are roots, etc., may all be taken.”
